summary: A comprehensive test suite that verifies the functionality of the Django makemigrations management command across a wide range of scenarios, including merge handling, conflict detection, dryâ€‘run behavior, verbosity levels, interactive prompts, schema consistency, router awareness, and various edge cases such as empty migrations, missing apps, and custom naming.
business_intent: To guarantee that migration generation works correctly and predictably in Django projects, preventing regressions and ensuring proper error handling, user interaction, and integration with database routing and schema validation.
